mapper.select: SELECT acc.ACCTGRUL_ID ACCTGRUL_ID , acc.CRDLINFO_FID CRDLINFO_FID , acc.REMARKS REMARKS , acc.ACCT_CODE ACCT_CODE, acc.DEBIT DEBIT , acc.CREDIT CREDIT , acc.TAXRATE TAXRATE , acc.AMOUNT AMOUNT, acc.CURRENCY CURRENCY, acc.EX_RATE EX_RATE, acc.QUANTITY QUANTITY, acc.ORICURRENCY_AMOUNT ORICURRENCY_AMOUNT, acc.UNIT UNIT, acc.UNIT_PRICE UNIT_PRICE, acc.DIMENSION DIMENSION, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX6 FDETAILID__FFLEX6, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX7 FDETAILID__FFLEX7, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX8 FDETAILID__FFLEX8, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX9 FDETAILID__FFLEX9, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX10 FDETAILID__FFLEX10, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX11 FDETAILID__FFLEX11, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX12 FDETAILID__FFLEX12, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX13 FDETAILID__FFLEX13, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX4 FDETAILID__FFLEX4, acc.FDETAILID__FFLEX5 FDETAILID__FFLEX5, acc.FDETAILID__FF100002 FDETAILID__FF100002, aux.AUXACCTG_ID AUXACCTG_ID, aux.ACCTGRUL_FID ACCTGRUL_FID, aux.BANKACCOUNT_CODE BANKACCOUNT_CODE, aux.BANKACCOUNT BANKACCOUNT, aux.DEPT_CODE DEPT_CODE, aux.DEPT DEPT, aux.IAE_CONTG_CODE IAE_CONTG_CODE, aux.IAE_CONTG IAE_CONTG, aux.AUXACCTG_CODE AUXACCTG_CODE, aux.AUXACCTG AUXACCTG, aux.MAINCASH_CODE MAINCASH_CODE, aux.MAINCASHFLOW MAINCASHFLOW, aux.ATTACHCASH_CODE ATTACHCASH_CODE, aux.ATTACHCASHFLOW ATTACHCASHFLOW, aux.AUXACCTG_AMOUNT AUXACCTG_AMOUNT FROM acctgrul as acc LEFT JOIN auxacctg as aux ON aux.ACCTGRUL_FID = acc.ACCTGRUL_ID WHERE acc.CRDLINFO_FID = #{crdlinfo_id} AND acc.STATUS != '1' AND aux.STATUS != '1' ORDER BY acc.ROWINDEX
